nodes.text: The Lothal Papyri were a series of agricultural treatises related to the planet Lothal. They were kept in the Jedi Archives within the Jedi Temple on the planet Coruscant. When Jedi Initiates misbehaved, they were made to translate the treatises as a punishment.

When they were Initiates, Jedi Masters Yula Braylon and Lene Kostana were tasked with deciphering the papyri by Jedi Grand Master Yoda. Completing the project took them at least three months. Later, in 87 BBY, Yoda assigned the same task to Initiates Sifo-Dyas and Dooku for breaking into the Bogan Collection, a hidden vault in the Jedi Archives which contained dark side artifacts.
The Lothal Papyri appeared in a flashback in Dooku: Jedi Lost, a 2019 audiobook written by Cavan Scott.
